mapper.select: select * from tb_sam_expense_category where user_id = 'admin' or user_id = #{userId} order by expense_category_no
select * from tb_sam_income_category where user_id = 'admin' or user_id = #{userId} order by income_category_no
mapper.insert: insert into tb_sam_expense ( user_id, expense_category_no, expense_content, expense_amount, expense_date ) values( #{userId}, #{expenseCategoryNo}, #{expenseContent}, #{expenseAmount}, #{expenseDate} )
insert into tb_sam_income ( user_id, income_category_no, income_content, income_amount, income_date ) values( #{userId}, #{incomeCategoryNo}, #{incomeContent}, #{incomeAmount}, #{incomeDate} )
mapper.select:
select ex.expense_no, ex.user_id, exc.expense_category_name, exc.expense_category_no, ex.expense_content, ex.expense_amount, ex.expense_date
order by ex.expense_date

select income.income_no, income.user_id, inc.income_category_name, inc.income_category_no, income.income_content, income.income_amount, income.income_date
order by income.income_date

select count(ex.expense_date)
group by ex.expense_date order by ex.expense_date

select count(income.income_date)
group by income.income_date order by income.income_date

select exc.expense_category_name expenseCategoryName, sum(ex.expense_amount) eachSum, ex.expense_category_no expenseCategoryNo from tb_sam_expense ex, tb_sam_expense_category exc where ex.expense_category_no = exc.expense_category_no and ex.user_id = #{userId} and ex.expense_date between STR_TO_DATE (#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE (#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by ex.expense_category_no

select inc.income_category_name incomeCategoryName, sum(income.income_amount) eachSum, inc.income_category_no incomeCategoryNo from tb_sam_income income, tb_sam_income_category inc where income.income_category_no = inc.income_category_no and income.user_id = #{userId} and income.income_date between STR_TO_DATE (#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE (#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by income.income_category_no
